kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://rest-server-container:5000/items (redirected) path_url=/items headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.4', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://rest-server-container:5000/items/ status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'Werkzeug/3.1.3 Python/3.10.18', 'Date': 'Sat, 16 Aug 2025 14:05:52 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'text/html; charset=utf-8', 'Content-Length': '100', 'Connection': 'close'} body=[{"name": "item_0"}, {"name": "item_1"}, {"name": "item_2"}, {"name": "item_3"}, {"name": "item_4"}]
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
